website_summaries.verdict: The Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones combine quality Bluetooth audio and above-average noise cancellation.
pros: Rich, crisp sound signature with a focus on high-mid definition
Wireless audio and active noise cancellation
NC can be disabled to save battery life
Apple W1 chip makes pairing with iOS devices even more simple
cons: Adaptive aspect of NC is not impressive

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it atall
customer_reviews.text: I have got these after owning a pair of Bose qc35's for the last 2 years, the sound is a lot quieter and the bass is barely there. I'm very dossapointed, yiur just buying the brand in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.......!!!
customer_reviews.text: Having owned beats headphones in the past, always thought they were a bit bass heavy, and build quality somewhat flimsy, these are a different animal altogether, build quality is much better and the sound is fantastic, even the range of the Bluetooth was superb all around the house with zero dropouts Haven't had the chance yet to try the ANC feature outside but will given time Overall very impressed and I found these better than the bose that I had last year
customer_reviews.author: P. Baines

customer_reviews.title: - Great sound with powerful bass - Pairs easily
customer_reviews.text: Plus points: - Great sound with powerful bass - Pairs easily, especially with Apple devices - Easy switching between devices is a great feature - Looks good, with subtle beats branding - Noise isolation is good - Noise cancelling is OK, but I think my expectation is probably too high after reviewing some of the other reviews. It will cancel repetitive sounds like an aeroplane engine, but it won't cancel everything (e.g. someone else watching the TV) Negative points: - Quite heavy (although this does suggest solid construction) - The pads made my ears feel too hot, but my wife said she didn't have a problem
customer_reviews.author: AndyC

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose - great battery life. Easy Bluetooth set up.
customer_reviews.text: Best set of headphones I’ve owned, third pair and latest upgrade. Battery life is better than expected. Very comfortable and well made, more reliable than my Bose headphones - kind of says it all. Disappointed that I paid full up - amazon dropped £50 soon after I bought mine - there should be a 28 day rule and amazon customer credits for price drops. Cmon Amazon be inspirational and show the other online retailers how to look after customers. Even 50% back on a price drop would be welcome. One day maybe?
customer_reviews.author: mr mi

customer_reviews.title: Best £250 i have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I commute a lot in central london which means an abundance of loud human beings. I wear these and i cannot hear anything. No more annoying kids squealing rubbish no more stupid conversations drowning out your music. Screaming baby on your train car? These are for you. Loud tourists. Buy these. Want to ignore everything in life. Buy these
customer_reviews.author: michael patrick

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have always avoided the BEATS name as i believed i was just paying for the name.. i went through several bluetooth headphones and all were terrible and i couldnt get on with the In-Ear ones as they kept falling out.. i thought why not try them i purchased the SOLO 3 Wireless and loved them and never looked back..so when it came time to replace them i tried these and getting Amazons extended warrantee too. and these are great too. moment you turn them on even with no sound the sound outside seems to die down as if these deafen you slightly.. the battery life on these are great
customer_reviews.author: chunk1000uk

customer_reviews.title: Simply fantastic. Everything you could want!
customer_reviews.text: I had the studio wireless 1 for 3 years and they stopped working so under guarantee was given these instead! Firstly they are so much comfier and lighter which is amazing. Secondly the bass wont give you a headache. Everything is nicely balanced and I can hear every instrument clearly and equally. They also look awesome obviously! And you do get 3 hours playback in just 10 minutes charge which is so handy! I'm in love! Go on... treat yourself 😏😉
customer_reviews.author: Mo Salah

customer_reviews.title: Pricey....but one happy boy
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for nephew and it did not disappoint. Once connected, fitted his head well, very little could be heard as we were testing the volume to outsiders. They are pricey, so I was dubious on what they were advertising compared to other, equally as good models. Cant give an accurate gauge for battery life, but I can say these are never off his head, so they must be good
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is ok, but no where near as good as my previous sennheisers.
customer_reviews.text: I will admit these feel high quality, however, the sound quality is nowhere near those of my previous over-ear Sennheisers. I would even argue my £20 in-ear Sennheiser sounds better! I have attempted to calibrate my audio to deliver a better range which has helped a bit, however, for the price I was expecting a lot more. the wireless connectivity is handy but the battery life is terrible, I need to charge it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones I ever try. Feels in hand like those cheap wireless headphones from Ali Express. Noise cancelling those not even feel like there is any, beats I was thinking that will beat my bose qc35 II in base 🤣🤣🤣🤣 they are sound worst and base not existing. For me its plastic rubbish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best over the head headphones i've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, great brand, great sound. Fits nicely over the ears to provide immersive sound. Bluetooth connectivity connects with ease to another apple product and has the option of turning the noise cancellation on and off at will. The audiophiles would say that the sound is not great but they are comparing these to really expensive headphones. Not sore on the head for wearing these for hours at a time. Would recommend for music lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Critical1

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 14 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Screw came loose on the right ear piece causing it to become very loose and flimsy. Only a matter of time before it fully breaks off. Build quality not what you would expect for top of the range headphones. Very disappointed and would likely buy the Bose alternative instead when these eventually give up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sound great and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these headphones. I wore them on airplane and they cut out about 95% of the noise in the cabin. Watched movies on the planes entertainment system using the cable and listened to music using Bluetooth from my iPhone. The charge lasted the whole flight which was 12 hours with about 60% left. Really impressed. Sound quality is excellent too. They are also very comfortable. I also like they way the fold so they fit in my back easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not BOSE.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to listen to music whilst on my turbo trainer and the first thing I noticed when turning them on was a ticking in the left hand side, this does disappear when you are listening to music though. The comfort level is ok, but isn’t anywhere near the level of the BOSE QC35 II which I also have. The headband is pretty hard and only has a small bit of padding. The cups are comfy, but lose their firmness pretty quickly. Overall, not bad, but not a headphone I would want to use for a long time due to the comfort level. The sound quality is ok, but on all levels not as good as the BOSE.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Crack and break
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, they break, the ear muffs fall apart, its very poor in construction. There is little improvement from sound quality over the last 2 generations. Get something better or cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: SexyRoger

customer_reviews.title: Average expensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones after I left my Bose QC35 at the gym and at the time Amazon had the beats on offer, the sound quality is not bad, the noise-cancelling is not the best you can still hear everything. the headphones take a little time to connect to the phone which is a pain as I have manually connected the headphones to my blue tooth. The battery life is good, better design than the Bose QC35, but not as comfortable as the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality - perfect for runs and at the gym.
customer_reviews.text: Really debated on whether to buy these or the Bose quiet comforts II and I am very happy with my choice. I decided to try both and keep my favourite. The studio 3s just felt a lot more secure on my head whilst at the gym or out on a jog and the audio quality is great. The noise cancelling difference between these and the quiet comforts is definitely noticeable with the music off but when you are listening at a good volume I really struggled to see much of a difference. This is totally subjective but I can definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Top sounds
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. They only down fall is that they are slightly too big. So if you are petite they I would advise trying them on first. They are also a little heavy on your head. But you can’t deny the sound quality. Amazing and they always hook up to your device quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Noise Cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Heard a lot of mixed reviews about these, which due to the price, made me hesitant to purchase. However I have had them for 3 weeks and I LOVE Them. The noise cancellation is fantastic, and has made a huge difference to my performance in the gym. The sound quality is fantastic to me, and they’re really comfortable. Furthermore, unlike most headphones, they stay put during movements like deadlifts in the gym which is a major plus! The only negative thing i’d say is the play button has quite a “cheap” sound to it when pressed, but it’s very minor.
customer_reviews.author: LivPricey

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Sound is OK but a bit low. Battery life is awesome. Noise cancelling is really good. Design and materials doesn't feel very premium (apart from the packaging). Price is awful.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Boom without the bang!
customer_reviews.text: If u like this brand you’ll have no complaints, love the look, feel and sound! But honestly, Some albums/artists sound ok, some fantastic, a bit hit and miss. Base isn’t what it was, which I prefer!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Shame. Not loud enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for travellers ect. I wanted to use for gym so like my music loud. These felt half the power of my ‘cheap’ headphones but loved the sound deaderning but just not loud enough!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great with apple iPhones. Good sound, good base, really comfortable and stylish. Decent noise cancelling My favourite headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Stepsys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my husband for christmas, he loves them. Perfect for what he needed, i also have a pair. Highly recommened.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Beats, after upgrading from 1st generation Solos. The quality of sound is much more refined (less of that signature base enhancement with the originals). Comfortable to wear and good battery life. Overall really pleased with sound and quality, much sturdier than my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Baglady

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for log distance flying and they are sublime. Even when I wasn’t listening to anything they cancelled the busy airplane noise right down so much that I was able to sleep. Sound quality is great, love having that little more bass than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bassy but very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality very durable and presented with an amazing case and charger etc , the sound is good and bass but could be clearer and sharper
customer_reviews.author: Jatinder Spall

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. The recipient loves them and uses them daily. Great for traveling and noise cancellation on planes.stylish but Rather expensive but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and battery life, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these, great sound quality and the noise cancelling works really well for the train commute. Battery lasts ages, haven’t had to charge in several weeks. Look great, comfortable and quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Not good, will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I have not been happy with these sub par headphones since purchase a few weeks ago. Now they will not charge. Amazon haven't a clue what to do!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not true noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: These are great and have really good sound and battery life but I think the Bose would be better for a true noise cancelling experience. I can still hear the train back noise while using these
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gates

customer_reviews.title: 5* headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these, look good and work perfectly with anything Apple. Sound is great and noise cancellation is brilliant if you travel a lot. They charge super fast and last ages
customer_reviews.author: Stereophonic1980

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant, got these for my dad, YES!! He's finally in the 12st century with no wires.
customer_reviews.author: karl

customer_reviews.title: Good, But bit of hiss from the ANC sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: Wear these for the gym. Comfy and firm enough in the bonce. My only issue is that every now and then the ANC kicks in some hiss. Switching them off and in again seems to get rid but it’s a bit odd
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality, noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I gave them 4 starts because they’re pretty decent but you expect so much more from the sound quality but it’s not what you expect. The sound you could probably get from 20 pound headphones but still they’re pretty decent. If your looking for rich sound buy some Bose headphones because they will probably give you more of what you expect. To conclude, they’re not bad it’s just they’re kinda a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, comes with a wire. sound quality is fantastic! I got it in the sale definitely worth the sale price
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best get better
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my old wired beats, they don’t disappoint, same fantastic sound, easy to connect, good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Russ 81

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sounding headphones would have been five stars but memory foam around ear cups feels flimsy
customer_reviews.author: c t farrington

customer_reviews.title: They are fairly good
customer_reviews.text: They have really good NC and if like me you have an android download the app as it makes them really easy to use. They also feel well built and are great to look at. They dont have the bass i would like them to have but everything else is good and very good accessories. I got them off amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.author: Leon p

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and looks good too!
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant product! Sound quality is amazing and they look good. Only four stars because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: learalis

customer_reviews.title: Not as bassy as the original Studios
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe with this is that the sound isnt as bassy as the original Studios (which were incredible) however, it does sound nice and clear. I also wished the volume would go higher but for most I assume it will be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nerowannade

customer_reviews.title: Bests headphones best
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent head phones , top quality sound & excellent quality care . Really trilled with the headphone
customer_reviews.author: Derek Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I sent this product in for an exchange, siting there was a problem with the on button. Not switching off and then not on. The product was returned to me saying all was fine. Well it’s not and it’s doing exactly the same thing again. Not going off and only working every time I charge it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kalmiyh
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Xmas hasn’t Mohamed about them so I guess there ok
customer_reviews.author: KDW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price quick delivery. Superb noise cancelling. Not as basey as previous models, very Bose esque sound!
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price considering what Apple want to charge you if you walk into any of their stores. The headphones are great quality, the sounds is clear and bassy with the ANC working exceedingly well. Well worth the price tag
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Beats
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pair of headphones sound quality is awesome would recommend if in the market for some new headphones
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for shutting out external noise. They feel like they build a pressure on your ears to deliver high quality sounds. First time buying beats and deffinetly will be buying again in the future. It’s a great change over from the Sony headphones I’ve been buying previous.
customer_reviews.author: Swishy

customer_reviews.title: great noise cancelling and best
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, (teenager) loves them, great noise cancelling and best base
customer_reviews.author: masky

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it with ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Not the best for sound quality/noise cancelling, if you want that I’d look to Bose, but they are very comfy and very user friendly due to the W1 chip. Bought due to ease of use
customer_reviews.author: ben w.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but quality
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but just not sure if they completely warrant the price tag. Great for commuting especially on the train. Very good sound quality and very good for drumming. But still a bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McClarty

customer_reviews.title: Hair gets tangled
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. My hair gets tangled. Also, noise cancelling feature is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Carla Forchino Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are good, the work well, don't hurt my head. Battery life seems pretty decent. I think the sound quality could be a bit better, they sound a little lacking in the detail of the mids. But maybe most people won't notice or care?
customer_reviews.author: Adz

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and have now been using it for about 2 months and it’s been great, the sounds and noise cancelling are great and I don’t get aches in my jaws when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Keating

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Connection to apple devices was quick and easy. Not quite comfortable for longer duration wearing in my experience. Battery life was ok. Overall could be better with design, features and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, background noise very much cancelled out
customer_reviews.text: Got these for travelling for work, used them on 6 flight since Christmas and am really pleased as you can enjoy what your listening to without the engine noise in the background
customer_reviews.author: James Rix

customer_reviews.title: Design
customer_reviews.text: Tuned just so that you dint damage your hearing. The cord for when battery is low is a good option for listening when you don’t have a power socket nearby
customer_reviews.author: discspinna73

customer_reviews.title: No sound from 1 side
customer_reviews.text: Bought these while no sound came from the left side of one ear so had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The noise cancelling is not quite what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelling is not quite what i expected. was hoping for more than what they actually are considering the cost
customer_reviews.author: M stagno d'alcontres

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding, with good ANC which generally preserves audio quality. W1 chip makes it a no-brainer if you're looking for ANC headphones and you're in the Apple ecosystem.
customer_reviews.author: Fraser L.

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for who looking for long hours usage
customer_reviews.text: Just love them, just after few hours they start to annoys your ears and not the ideal for working out, but other than those 2 points basecly perfect
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Happy teenager!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my son's 14th birthday and he absolutely loves them. The sound is very good quality and the noise cancelling feature works a treat. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: carl watts

customer_reviews.title: Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are definatly worth the money. Does everything it says on the box. Excellent headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Baby D

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for Travelling
customer_reviews.text: tbf i bought this to flex cos i thought they were cool but they are surprisingly good and the noise cancelling is excellent which helped me on a flight with a crying baby and i couldn’t hear it at all
customer_reviews.author: NateChapman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and picked these up at a GREAT price! Recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot cheaper than going in store and just as great in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cameren

customer_reviews.title: Product defective
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. Battery was damaged. Sold as “like new”, but it totally did not match the description. Fully disappointed. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ANESTIS DIMITRIADIS

customer_reviews.title: Noise Cancellation 2nd to none!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wireless headphones I have had, the noise cancellation on them is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: jamal frimpong

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, compact, quick charge and good noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: John-David

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing headphones. The music sounds immense compared to standard ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headphones. The music sounds immense compared to standard earphones and the bluetooth works really well even at a distance. I would highly recommend them to anyone who is thinking of purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Stylish As Hell
customer_reviews.text: Really great.. Seriously good looking I just found the Bose had better sound quality.. but these are still very very good
customer_reviews.author: Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cancels out noise of surroundings
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes echos when on a call and it’s wireless but no other issues great
customer_reviews.author: Kindness01

customer_reviews.title: quality sound
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, quality sound, long battery life, quick charge and good price compare to other shops.
customer_reviews.author: Maciej Majcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Does everything that it says it does. Pairs up perfectly with my Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Chivers

customer_reviews.title: Impedance of beats studio 3 it’s important  in ohms one of important specification
customer_reviews.text: Similar headphones have louder + volume You need to adjust lower voice songs
customer_reviews.author: ATO57

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Connect easily with an Apple product and great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Really like it :) Very good sound. Amazing price (A Deal).
customer_reviews.author: Rafal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones just a bit big for carrying around
customer_reviews.author: callum

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived today. Amazingly packed and the headphone is great. Comes with one year apple warranty. Fantastic fit and clear sound quality as well. Honestly there is no need for ANC as it just creates a vacuum when you wear it (personal preference). Very easy to connect to apple products. Just keep the phone Bluetooth on and then switch on the headphones thats it, then just follow the instructions on your phone (check the attached photos). It doesn’t even takes 10 sec to pair. I hope the pictures and review will help. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya

customer_reviews.title: The packaging alone is worth £100....the headphones are good.
customer_reviews.text: Well built headphones with good isolation and fair active noise cancelling. Sound is good across music genres. Works wonderfully with iOS but Android pairing has issues with Google asssistsnt, some if you use a Spotify and want voice control your going to get a nasty pitched tone before connecting...its the sound of Jonny Ive punishing you for straying. The packaging is astoundingly good...if your into packaging design buy the phones, keep the packaging and sell the cans on eBay. Bought on discount so good value.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I’m disappointed with those headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’ve had previous model of wireless Beats Studio and I have to say, they’ve been better. It’s a matter of personal preference, but if you are expecting deep bass which Beats headphones are known for - you won’t find it here. ANC works great, perfect built quality, but when it comes to sound quality - a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Wojciech

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and good sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, but the sound on these headphones are pretty good. Not being too bassy like the older generation beats is a positive in my opinion, and the fact they look good is another plus in my book ( i can see why the design hasn't really chnaged from the older model). I snagged em for £200 which compared to the normal retail price of around £300 (at most retailers), seems like pretty good value especially since the solo3 is priced around the £200 mark, and the studio3 is much more comfortable than the solo3s,
customer_reviews.author: Hasanul Ambia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for many reasons, given the version the brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing for many reasons, given the version the brand should be on, I wasn’t blown away for what I was being sold for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Akila

customer_reviews.title: Beats 3 by Dr Dre excellent ANR
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones. ANR is good, not quite as good as my Bose QC 30 in ear buds in an internal environment, but BEATS them hands down outside. Their ability to remove wind noise leaves my Bose standing. No more irritating wind ruining my listening. Excellent. Two caveats. The headband lacks padding so can be hard on the top of the head, and the leatherette padding on the earpieces really aught to be something like Chamois leather or some other natural covering to wick the perspiration away. Bit sticky. Bluetooth connection auto connects easily, and connection is solid. Battery life really long, outlasts my iPod several times over. Very subtle battery level LED's, overall design good. Overall an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzodog

customer_reviews.title: Can't justify the price. The sound is just too bland for me
customer_reviews.text: The design is perfect and works amazingly with apple products. The sound just isn't as good as my earphones and I can't justify the price so they're going back. The noise cancellation amazed me; if you travel on public transport every day then get these.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Coleman

customer_reviews.title: User friendly, comfy and pretty good sound and noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and good looking. sound is good but should soind a lot better for that price, the sound is not much better than the solo 3 wireless. The noice reduction is pretty good, but when you dont listen to Music the white noise sounds very much, for that price there are a lot of much better headphones both in sound quality and noise reduction. But... the winning point is the W1 chip which makes the user experience top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: No regrets here
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I once said I'd never pay that amount of money for headphones or ever move away from earbuds. But after trying a friend's I knew these were the pair. Very comfy, amazing sound cancelling, good quality and loud if that's what you wish. I never have these off. Suitable for the gym
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'neill

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE HEADPHONES!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and they comfortable for hours! They’re plenty loud enough to blow your little head off. The battery life is great too, they last me a whole week with daily use. I have the matt black version and they look stealthy! Would highly recommend over the smaller Solos.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lowe

customer_reviews.title: they're amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Only had them a week and don't know how I lived without them... they're amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Chicken John

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Is very good for this headphone. And Sound quality is very good. I’m very likely it. Recommend this headphone it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, & last for ages without charge.
customer_reviews.text: One of the ear pads on my hubby’s Studio2 wireless headphones recently fell off, so rather than pay the laughable repair fees, I got him these as an early Christmas pressie. While the noise cancelling is the same brilliant quality as the Studio2’s, these definitely feel a bit more lightweight with a softer ear cushion, making them so much more comfortable and therefore ideal for long-term use. Just as well, as the charge on these lasts for absolutely ages ;) Best all round headphones yet, although the current colours available are a bit unexciting compared to some of the other Beats models imo.
customer_reviews.author: Beanie

customer_reviews.title: Very good for under 200
customer_reviews.text: Very good value £199 instead of £299 sound quality not amazing but very good no voice prompts an in the dark you don’t n know what is left or right not good for visual impaired or even people with 20 20 vision but not bad for 200 quid but definitely not worth 300 and it’s ment to be Apple but what’s with a usb charging port NO LIGHTING!! Appel really need to address this. Very comfortable to ware Sound quality good Noise cancelling ok Volume not that loud Very easy to pair especially with Apple products (iMac, tv, iPad, iPhone Mac Pro, etc..) Don’t pay 300 as not worth that price but at 200 they are worth that
customer_reviews.author: StephenT

product_meta.title: Beats Studio3 Wireless Noise Cancelling On-Ear Headphones - Apple W1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, Active Noise Cancelling, 22 Hours Of Listening Time - Matte Black
feature_bullets: High-performance wireless noise cancelling headphones in matte black
Compatible with iOS and Android devices.
Pure adaptive noise canceling (pure ANC) actively blocks external noise
Real-time Audio calibration preserves a Premium listening experience
Up to 22 hours of battery life enables full-featured all-day wireless playback
Apple's W1 chip and industry-leading Bluetooth technology keep you connected farther with fewer drop-outs
With fast Fuel, a 10-minute charge gives 3 hours of play when battery is low. Rechargeable lithium ion battery
Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the multifunction on-ear controls and microphone
What's in the box: Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones, Carrying case, 3.5mm RemoteTalk cable, Universal USB charging cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
